enum TextDecorationStyle {
  /// Draw a solid line
  solid,
  /// Draw two lines
  double,
  /// Draw a dotted line
  dotted,
  /// Draw a dashed line
  dashed,
  /// Draw a sinusoidal line
  wavy
}

3.2. TextSpan

TextSpan(
        text: 'Jok Ma,hello!',

          fontSize: 20,

          TextSpan(
              text: 'Bo',

                  fontSize: 20,

                  backgroundColor: Colors.black12)),
          TextSpan(

                  fontSize: 30,
                  color: Colors.red,
                  backgroundColor: Colors.lightGreenAccent)),
          TextSpan(
              text: 'two line',

                  fontSize: 30,
                  color: Colors.red,

          TextSpan(
            text: '\nç‚¹å‡»æ‰“å¼€æˆ‘ ğŸ–±http://www.fgyong.cn',

            recognizer: new TapGestureRecognizer()..onTap = () {

                      },
          ),
        ]),
  ),
 //æ˜¯å¦æ‰“å¼€url
void _openUrl(String url) async {
if (await canLaunch(url)) {
  await launch(url);
} else {
  throw 'could not launch $url';
}
}
